metadata.name: Bitnode #1/1000
metadata.description:
This was the first image representation of how the Bitcoin node works, no matter where you are, no matter what kind of situation you are in, even if you are a top, middle or low class individual, Bitcoin can reach you. 

Let's all say no to centralized and controllable government, join Bitcoin movement now.

Bitnode will act as your PASS to our Hope ecosystem. Visit our site for more info:  
https://hope.com

Please subscribe to our youtube channel too: 
https://www.youtube.com/@TraderUniversity
